configuration:
hadoop.tmp.dir /tmp/hadoop-${comp.sfResolve("user")}
fs.default.name ${comp.sfResolve("filesystem.uri")}
<% if (comp.sfResolve("iBrix", false, false)) { %>
fs.ibrix.impl com.hp.hpl.filesystem.IBrixFileSystem IBrix FileSystem Integration
fs.ibrix.getsegscript ${comp.fusionManager.ibrixBinDir}/fmap IBrix Location of file mapper script which prints the segment for a file
fs.ibrix.gethostscript ${sfResolve("directory")}/getsegmentsperhost.py IBrix FileSystem script which returns the segment host association
fs.ibrix.cluster ${comp.fusionManager.ibrixclusterName} IBrix FileSystem cluster
fs.ibrix.filesystem ${comp.fusionManager.filesystem} IBrix FileSystem name
<% }%>
